title: Omnicron69
author: Omnicron69
content: Rheix Dev, please step forward and run your project. Lots of coins mined but hash is dropping now, your killing your own projecthttps://rheix.com/Algo GhostriderTonight, I'll make a un-official discord unless someone else does

comments.author: Salamande
comments.body: Quote from: Omnicron69 on December 05, 2023, 03:13:55 PMRheix Dev, please step forward and run your project. Lots of coins mined but hash is dropping now, your killing your own projecthttps://rheix.com/Algo GhostriderTonight, I'll make a un-official discord unless someone else doesNo need to bother and here is why:Total block mined from now: 4249 @ 150s block time equal approx: 7,4 days so launched approx nov 28th Pool (Rplant) show up nov 30th, 2 days later.What that means? They mined 2 complete days, so about 1100 blocks to load up to be able to create masternode.When they have enough, boom rplant pool, to be sure what normal folks can mine must be impossible to get enough to create masternode (850k).So their own masternode can get all the reward for a good period of time.Still want to mine/buy this shit?

comments.author: Omnicron69
comments.created_time: December 05, 2023, 04:14:53 PMLast edit: December 06, 2023, 06:43:22 AM by Omnicron69
comments.body: Why yes, I like making money, my cpu farm is hungry. Every gr coin has a "premine" who cares...well maybe a few but they dont matter.  I started mining on rplant the 2nd day it was released, was the second miner there. It was like block 700 or something.

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
